thread.title: Charles Koch on the millions spent on politics, and his influence on politics
thread.title_full: Charles Koch on the millions spent on politics, and his influence on politics

title: Charles Koch on the millions spent on politics, and his influence on politics
text: Charles Koch on the millions spent on politics, and his influence on politics October 12, 2015, 2:02 PM | Charles and David Koch have become major players in campaign finance, using their combined $86 billion to bankroll a network of conservative groups that helped create the tea party movement. Charles made a rare television appearance on "CBS Sunday Morning", to discuss "dark funding" Related Videos
